title: [HIGH] DeFi Protocol Integration - Real Web3 Connection
body:
## Vision Gap

DeFi connector uses MOCK DATA only. K.I.T. should interact with real DeFi protocols.

## Current State
- defi_monitor.py returns hardcoded data
- No Web3 wallet connection
- No actual protocol interaction

## Required Implementation

### Wallet Connection
- MetaMask / WalletConnect support
- Multiple wallet addresses
- Multi-chain (ETH, Polygon, Arbitrum, BSC)

### Protocol Support

#### Lending/Borrowing
- [ ] Aave v3
- [ ] Compound
- [ ] Real health factor monitoring
- [ ] Auto-deleverage on liquidation risk

#### Liquid Staking
- [ ] Lido (stETH)
- [ ] Rocket Pool (rETH)
- [ ] Coinbase (cbETH)
- [ ] Real staking rewards tracking

#### DEX/Liquidity
- [ ] Uniswap v3
- [ ] SushiSwap
- [ ] Curve
- [ ] Impermanent loss tracking

### Automation
- Auto-compound yields
- Rebalance positions
- Harvest rewards
- Gas optimization

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Can read real DeFi positions
- [ ] Can execute staking/unstaking
- [ ] Can deposit/withdraw from lending
- [ ] Health factor alerts work
- [ ] Yield APY is accurate

## Priority: HIGH
